title: Patch Notes
content: to Mar'hyah. Minsc's armguards no longer magically disappear mid-dialogue. Improved some shots of betentacled Wyll if he takes the evil path at the end of the game. Fixed your character playing their crouching animation twice in a row in the dialogue with the Dying Stone Lord Thug if you choose to make him suffer. Popped Mirkon's shoulders back into their sockets when you talk to him in Rivington. Fixed Akabi's body popping out of place when he yells at you to drown him in coin. Fixed a moment
